HasPageLabel= |link=none |format=Plainlist |template=PagePartTemplate }} |}}</includeonly>

<noinclude> 1=filename </noinclude> <includeonly>{{#ask:[[Category:Figure]][[HasFigureType::Flowchart]][[BelongsToComponent::{{{1|}}}]] |mainlabel=page |?HasPageName=figure |?HasAltTitle=alt |?HasCaption=caption |format=Plainlist |link=none |template=ViewFlowchartTemplate }}</includeonly>

<noinclude>template for asking and positioning the icon of a page</noinclude> <includeonly>{{#ask:[[Category:Figure]][[HasFigureType::Icon]][[BelongsToComponent::{{{1|}}}]] |mainlabel=page |?HasPageName=figure |?HasCaption=caption |?HasAltTitle=alt |format=Plainlist |link=none |template=ViewIconTemplate }} </includeonly>

It should be called in the following format: 
{{InfoBoxtemplate}}
{{#ifeq:{{InfoboxTestTemplate|basepage={{ROOTPAGENAME}}|subpage={{SUBPAGENAME}} }}|0||
{{#ifeq:{{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=IsImplementationOf|page={{ROOTPAGENAME}}|reverse=1 }}|0|| {{#ifeq:{{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasIMAGEComponent|page={{#titleparts: {{FULLPAGENAME}}|1}} }}|0|| }} }}{{#ifeq:{{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasApplication|page={{#titleparts: {{FULLPAGENAME}}|1}} }}|0|| }}{{#ifeq:{{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasModelDatabase|page={{#titleparts: {{FULLPAGENAME}}|1}} }}|0|| }}{{#ifeq:{{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasOverview|page={{#titleparts: {{FULLPAGENAME}}|1}} }}|0|| }}{{#ifeq:{{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasKeyReference|page={{#titleparts: {{FULLPAGENAME}}|1}} }}|0|| }}{{#ifeq:{{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasReference|page={{FULLPAGENAME}} }}|0|| }}
Component is implemented in:
{{#arraymap: {{#ask:[[IsImplementationOf::{{ROOTPAGENAME}}]]|link=none|sep=;}} |;|yy |{{#arraymap: {{#ask:[[Category:ModelVersion]][[IsVersionOf::yy]]|link=none|sep=;}} |;|xx |{{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[IsCurrentVersion::true]][[IsVersionOf::yy]]|link=none}}|xx |
  • [[yy]] (version {{#ask:[[xx]]|format=Plainlist}})
{{#ask:[[Category:AggregatedComponent]][[-IsImplementationOf::yy]] |intro=Aggregated component:|format=ul }}{{#ask:[[Category:Component]][[-IsImplementationOf::yy]] |intro=Components:|format=ul}} |}} |}} | and }}
Related IMAGE components
{{#ask:[[-HasIMAGEComponent::{{#titleparts: {{FULLPAGENAME}}|1}}]]|format=ul}}

This is the "InfoboxTestTemplate" template. it returns 1 (true) if an infobox should be displayed, 0 (false) otherwise It should be called in the following format; subpage is optional 
{{InfoboxTestTemplate
|basepage=
|subpage=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {{#ifexpr: {{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasReference|page={{{basepage|}}} }} or {{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasIMAGEComponent|page={{{basepage|}}} }} or {{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasApplication|page={{{basepage|}}} }} or {{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasModelDatabase|page={{{basepage|}}} }} or {{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasKeyReference|page={{{basepage|}}} }} or {{#ifeq:{{{subpage|}}}| |{{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasReference|page={{{basepage|}}} }} |{{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasReference|page={{{basepage|}}}/{{{subpage|}}} }} }} |1|0}}

This is the "LinkToExpertpageTemplate" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{LinkToExpertpageTemplate
1 page from category Component
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {{#ifeq:{{#show:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|? -ExpertPageBelongsTo}}|| |
'''More detailed (Expert) descriptions:'''
    {{#arraymap: {{#ask:[[ExpertPageBelongsTo::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|link=none|sep=;}} |;|mainpage |
  • [[mainpage|{{#show:mainpage|?HasLabel}}]]
    • |}}
}}

This is the "testPropertyTemplate" template. returns true (<> 0) if page has property . reverse is optional and should be used as reverse=1 for reversed properties It should be called in the following format: 
{{PropertyTestTemplate
|prop=
|page=
|reverse=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {{#ifeq:{{{reverse|}}}|1 |{{#ask:[[{{{prop|}}}::{{{page|}}}]]|format=count}} |{{#ask:[[-{{{prop|}}}::{{{page|}}}]]|format=count}} }}
[[{{{2|}}}|plain|255px|right|link=Framework overview|{{{3|}}}. Figure links to "Framework overview"|alt={{{4|}}}]]

* Template used in InputOutputParametertemplate to display drivers and model input variables. 1= Variable 2= description 3= variable type {{#ifeq:{{{3|}}} |historical data |[[{{{1|}}}]] (historical data) {{{2|}}} {{#show:{{{1|}}}| ?HasSource}} |[[{{{1|}}}]] {{{2|}}} {{#ifeq:{{{3|}}} |driver |{{#ask:[[Category:Component]][[FrameworkElementType::driver component]]}} |{{#ask:[[HasOutputVar::{{{1|}}}]]}} }} }}

* Template used in InputOutputParametertemplate to display model output variables. 1= Variable 2= description 3= use 4= variable type [[{{{1|}}}]] {{{2|}}} {{#ifeq:{{{3|}}} |model (end-indicator) |Final output |{{#ask:[[HasInputVar::{{{1|}}}]] |format=ul }} |}}

Used by inputOotputParameterTemplate. Puts the parameters in a row and merges source and basedon 1=parameter 2=desription 3=source 4 =basedon {{{1|}}} {{{2|}}} {{#ifeq:{{{4|}}}| |{{{3|}}} |{{#ifeq:{{{3|}}}| |{{{4|}}} |{{{3|}}}, {{{4|}}} }} }}

__NOEDITSECTION__{{#ifexpr: {{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasInputVar|page={{FULLPAGENAME}} }}+ {{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasParameter|page={{FULLPAGENAME}} }}+ {{PropertyTestTemplate|prop=HasOutputVar|page={{FULLPAGENAME}} }}> 0 |

this template displays and layouts the standard elements of a component
{{IconTemplate|{{#titleparts: {{FULLPAGENAME}}|1}} }} {{ContentPartsTemplate|PagePartHeader=Parts of {{FULLPAGENAME}} }}{{LinkToExpertpageTemplate }} __TOC____NOEDITSECTION__
{{InfoBoxTemplate}}{{DisplayFlowchartTemplate|{{#titleparts: {{FULLPAGENAME}}|1}} }}

This is the "ComponentTemplate2" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{ComponentTemplate2
|Application=
|IMAGEComponent=
|Model-Database=
|KeyReference=
|Reference=
}}
Steps in this template: # Icon en De subpages van deze pagina ophalen en weergeven in toc style plus de toc # De InfoboxTemplate aanroep # De flowchart # We beginnen de Component-beschrijving met de KeyPolicyQuestions # description # De input and outputs {{ComponentFrameTemplate}}
{{DisplayKeyPolicyQuestionsTemplate|{{PAGENAME}} }}

Introduction

[[Category:Component]] {{#set: |FrameworkElementType={{{FrameworkElementType|}}} |BelongsToAggregatedComponent={{{AggregatedComponent|}}} |HasInputVar={{{InputVar|}}}|+sep=; |HasOutputVar={{{OutputVar|}}}|+sep=; |HasParameter={{{Parameter|}}}|+sep=; |HasOverview={{{Overview|}}}|+sep=; |HasIMAGEComponent={{{IMAGEComponent|}}}|+sep=; |HasApplication={{{Application|}}}|+sep=; |HasModelDatabase={{{Model-Database|}}}|+sep=; |HasKeyReference={{{KeyReference|}}}|+sep=; |HasReference={{{Reference|}}}|+sep=; |HasPageLabel=Introduction page |HasDetailedDescription={{FULLPAGENAME}}/Description |HasPolicyIntervention={{FULLPAGENAME}}/Policy issues |HasDataLimitations={{FULLPAGENAME}}/Data_uncertainties_limitations |HasAllReferences={{FULLPAGENAME}}/References |HasComponentCode={{{ComponentCode|}}} }}
